snippet.title: Money Heist: Ultimate Choice | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Join the heist that started it all in NETFLIX STORIES: MONEY HEIST. Enter La Perla Museo de Barcelona alongside the Money Heist crew, but tread carefully! Your choices will determine the success of the Professor’s perfect plan. Coming soon to Netflix Stories.
#GeekedWeek

SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/29qBUt7

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services with over 247 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Money Heist: Ultimate Choice | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix
